Package grice.c195.DAO

Class AppointmentsDAO

java.lang.Object
grice.c195.DAO.AppointmentsDAO
public class AppointmentsDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for the appointments database table.

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(int UserId, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> appCustomerIDCombo, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> appContactCombo, javafx.scene.control.TextField appTitleField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appDescriptionField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appTypeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appLocationField, LocalDateTime appStartTimeField, LocalDateTime appEndTimeField)
      Adds an appointment to the database.
      Parameters:
      UserId - The ID of the user currently logged in.
      appCustomerIDCombo - The ComboBox containing the customer ID.
      appContactCombo - The ComboBox containing the contact name.
      appTitleField - The TextField containing the appointment title.
      appDescriptionField - The TextField containing the appointment description.
      appTypeField - The TextField containing the appointment type.
      appLocationField - The TextField containing the appointment location.
      appStartTimeField - The TextField containing the appointment start time.
      appEndTimeField - The TextField containing the appointment end time.

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(javafx.scene.control.TextField appIdField, int userId, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> appCustomerIDCombo, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> appContactCombo, javafx.scene.control.TextField appTitleField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appDescriptionField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appTypeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appLocationField, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker appStartDatePicker, javafx.scene.control.DatePicker appEndDatePicker, javafx.scene.control.TextField appStartTimeField, javafx.scene.control.TextField appEndTimeField)
      Updates an appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appIdField - The appointment ID field.
      userId - The user ID.
      appCustomerIDCombo - The customer ID combo box.
      appContactCombo - The contact combo box.
      appTitleField - The title field.
      appDescriptionField - The description field.
      appTypeField - The type field.
      appLocationField - The location field.
      appStartDatePicker - The start date picker.
      appEndDatePicker - The end date picker.
      appStartTimeField - The start time field.
      appEndTimeField - The end time field.

    • isBusinessHours

      public static boolean isBusinessHours(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      This method checks if the appointment is within business hours.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - The start date and time of the appointment that is based on the user's local time zone.
      endDateTime - The end date and time of the appointment that is based on the user's local time zone.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the appointment is within business hours, false if not.

    • isOverlapping

      public static boolean isOverlapping(int customerId, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      This method checks if the appointment overlaps with another appointment for the same customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer ID of the appointment.
      startDateTime - The start date and time of the appointment that is based on the user's local time zone.
      endDateTime - The end date and time of the appointment that is based on the user's local time zone.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the appointment overlaps with another appointment for the same customer, false if not.
